Genesis 1.1 1 In the beginning God created the <span style="text-decoration: line-through;"> heavens </span> <span style="font-weight: bold;"> heaven </span> and the earth. 
 Genesis 1.2 2 And the earth was without <span style="text-decoration: line-through;"> form, </span> <span style="font-weight: bold;"> form </span> and <span style="text-decoration: line-through;"> void; </span> <span style="font-weight: bold;"> void </span> and darkness was upon the face of the deep. And the Spirit of God moved upon the face of the waters. 
 Genesis 1.3 3 And God <span style="text-decoration: line-through;"> said, </span> <span style="text-decoration: line-through;"> Let </span> <span style="font-weight: bold;"> said: </span> <span style="font-weight: bold;"> "Let </span> there be <span style="text-decoration: line-through;"> light: </span> <span style="text-decoration: line-through;"> and </span> <span style="font-weight: bold;"> light". </span> <span style="font-weight: bold;"> And </span> there was light.
